title: CarX Drift Racing Online Free Download Direct Link
description:
CarX Drift Racing Online is the most realistic online racing simulator in such an unusual but very popular mode like Drift. Starting to play, you will plunge into the world of real drift, drive really cool cars and even be able to become a real champion The main difference between this simulator and dozens of others is that this one only has a Drift mode.
But on the other hand, you can take part in races not only with AI, but also with your friends, and with other players from all over the world. Hit the track and prove that you are a real drifter and not just an amateur . Having chosen the car you like, before the race you can even make it unique and unlike any other. The developers have added a convenient customization interface , thanks to which you can edit your car at your discretion.
